thread.title: Bhutan's Crown Prince Is Our Newest, Most Adorable Crush (PS: He's Turning One Soon)
thread.title_full: Bhutan's Crown Prince Is Our Newest, Most Adorable Crush (PS: He's Turning One Soon)

title: Bhutan's Crown Prince Is Our Newest, Most Adorable Crush (PS: He's Turning One Soon)
text:
facebook 416 SHARES 
We had a cute royal babies list (yes we are obsessed) in our minds - Prince George, Princess Charlotte and Baby Taimur (hey he is half-royal too). However, we now have another addition to this list - Bhutan's youngest royal, Crown Prince Jigme Namgyel Wangchuc, who turns one this month. 
Holding a yellow toy car and wearing a yellow striped robe, the Internet can't get enough of him and we can totally understand why. LOOK AT THOSE CHUBBY CHEEKS. 
The Crown Prince is the first child born to King Jigme Khesar Namgyel Wangchuck and Queen Jetsun Pema, who are known as the Dragon King and Dragon Queen. 
Here are some more picture of this adorable munchkin to melt your heart. Photo credits: Yellow
